services.name: Corporate Services
services.price: Up to 25% off for corporate clients

services.name: Collect & Deliver
services.price: Free over £45, 2-day turnaround or same-day express

operatingHours.gapIdentified: No after-hours coverage - closed at 6:30pm daily, evening enquiries go unanswered

digitalPresence.websiteQuality: Professional design with comprehensive pricing, but services page has placeholder Lorem Ipsum text
digitalPresence.reviewSummary: 4.5 stars on Yelp - praised for cleanliness, friendly staff (especially Tina), efficient machines, well-maintained facilities

painPoints: Complex pricing structure with 50+ price points - customers likely call just to get quick quotes on specialist items like wedding dresses, leather, or curtains
After-hours enquiry gap - closed at 6:30pm daily, so evening/night enquiries about collection bookings or specialist services go unanswered
Collection & Delivery friction - 'Call to arrange' model means bookings can only happen during staffed hours, inconvenient for busy professionals

subjectLines: Quick question about Boswell's collection service
icebreaker.message:
Hi,

I came across Boswell Laundrette while researching Central London laundry services—26 years in Holborn is impressive, and your reviews mention Tina by name, which says a lot about your service standards.

Quick question: when someone searches "wedding dress cleaning Holborn" at 8pm and lands on your site, how do they get pricing or book a collection before you open the next morning?

A laundromat we work with captured 49% of enquiries after hours—conversations that would have gone unanswered. Owners tell us it's like having extra help without the wage bill.

Would a 10-minute chat be worth exploring whether something similar could work for Boswell?

Cheers,
Jorge

outreach.reasoning: Direct email found on contact page allows for personalized subject line, more professional for B2B outreach, and trackable for follow-up

alternatives.note: Has service request fields, good for detailed enquiries
For direct conversation if no email response

sources.found: Company name, services overview, 26 years experience
Operating hours, USPs, business philosophy, staff always present
Full address, phone, email, contact form details
Complete pricing list, corporate discounts, special offers
Delivery process, free delivery threshold, turnaround times
4.5 stars on Yelp, staff member Tina mentioned in reviews
